ovdesc.p: This table captures the information specific to MiFID checks which helps in calculating the risk profile and there by recommending the appropriate investment program to the new customer.

1-10 numeric character Customer Code or 3-10 type MNE (uppercase alpha or numeric or '.') character Customer Mnemonic.

MiFID categorises clients into Retail Client, Professional Client and Eligible Counterparties based on level of knowledge, skill and expertise.It affords protection accordingly with Retails Clients having the most rigorous protection, followed by Professional Clients and then Eligible Counterparties. No protection is afforded to Discretionary Clients(No MiFID Controls)
